ca.mcgill.ecse211.capturetheflag

Class Navigation

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.mcgill.ecse211.capturetheflag.Navigation

  • public class Navigation
extends java.lang.Object
    Navigation class which navigates robot to specified points, determines direction to turn (Minimal turn) and how far to travel
    Author:
    Michael Vaquier, Oliver Clark

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Navigation(Odometer odometer, EV3LargeRegulatedMotor rightMotor, EV3LargeRegulatedMotor leftMotor, double wheelRadius, double track)
      Creates a Navigation object.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int convertAngle(double radius, double width, double angle)
      Converts distance to wheel rotation required for the physical robot to turn by a certain angle around its center of rotation.
      int convertDistance(double radius, double distance)
      Converts a distance to wheel rotation.
      void forward(double distance, boolean returnThread)
      Makes the robot move forward by a certain distance.

      Returns the heading at which the navigation got interrupted.

      This method interrupts the current navigation of the robot.

      Saves the heading at which the navigation got interrupted.
      void travelTo(double x, double y, boolean returnThread)
      This method causes the robot to travel to the absolute field location (x, y), specified in tilepoints by first adjusting its heading then moving forward.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Navigation

        public Navigation(Odometer odometer,
                  EV3LargeRegulatedMotor rightMotor,
                  EV3LargeRegulatedMotor leftMotor,
                  double wheelRadius,
                  double track)
        Creates a Navigation object.
        Parameters:
        odometer - Association to Odometer instance
        rightMotor - Reference to the right motor
        leftMotor - Reference to the left motor
        wheelRadius - Radius of the wheels of the robot (cm)
        track - Radius of the wheelbase of the robot (cm)

    • Method Detail

      • travelTo

        public void travelTo(double x,
                     double y,
                     boolean returnThread)
        This method causes the robot to travel to the absolute field location (x, y), specified in tilepoints by first adjusting its heading then moving forward. The returnThread boolean is used to determine if the thread should wait until the robot is done traveling to return
        Parameters:
        x - The target X position to travel to
        y - The target Y position to travel to
        returnThread - If true the thread does not wait for the travel to complete

      • turnTo

        public void turnTo(double theta)
        Makes the robot turn (minimal angle) to a new heading.
        Parameters:
        theta - Target heading to turn to

      • forward

        public void forward(double distance,
                    boolean returnThread)
        Makes the robot move forward by a certain distance. The returnThread boolean is used to determine if the thread should wait until the robot is done traveling to return.
        Parameters:
        distance - Distance to travel forward
        returnThread - If true the thread does not wait for the travel to complete

      • interruptNav

        public void interruptNav(boolean turnRight)
        This method interrupts the current navigation of the robot. This interruption is likely due it the ultrasonic sensor detecting an object in the robots trajectory.
        Parameters:
        turnRight - If true the robot turns right 90° upon interruption, if false it turn left by 90°

      • convertDistance

        public int convertDistance(double radius,
                           double distance)
        Converts a distance to wheel rotation.
        Parameters:
        radius - Radius of the wheel
        distance - Distance to convert
        Returns:
        Wheel rotation in degrees

      • convertAngle

        public int convertAngle(double radius,
                        double width,
                        double angle)
        Converts distance to wheel rotation required for the physical robot to turn by a certain angle around its center of rotation.
        Parameters:
        radius - Radius of the wheel
        width - Width of the wheelbase
        angle - Angle turn wanted
        Returns:
        Wheel rotation in degrees

      • setInterruptedTheta

        public void setInterruptedTheta(double theta)
        Saves the heading at which the navigation got interrupted.
        Parameters:
        theta - New theta to be set

      • getInterruptedTheta

        public double getInterruptedTheta()
        Returns the heading at which the navigation got interrupted.
        Returns:
        Current theta at which navigation was interrupted
